value: <l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">i</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">For many centuries 
            <choice>
              <corr>after</corr>
              <sic>afte</sic>
            </choice> Britain became an island "</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">the <rs type="person" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#psn-gtre" key="Trevelyan, George">historian</rs> says, "the untamed forest was king."</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">He goes on to say that <del>a</del>millions of birds, perched on</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">the top of those matted branches, sang their choruses.</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">Onl<add place="inline">y</add> the skin clad hunters in the clearings heard the song.</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">The tree 
            <choice>
              <corr>had</corr>
              <sic>ha </sic>
            </choice> to be felled; and a hut made from its</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">branches , before the human voice sang too.</l>

<quote xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" source="#" rend="block">
            <l>By a bank as I lay</l>
            <l>Musing myself alone, <del hand="ms">j</del>
              <add place="above">h</add>ey ho!</l>
            <l>A birdes voice</l>
            <l>Did me rejoice,</l>
            <l>Singing before the day</l>
            <l>And me thought in her lay</l>
            <l>She said, winter was past, hey ho!</l>
          </quote>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>The first songs are out of door songs; because there</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>was no comfort indoors, little light, and no books.</del></l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">The voice that 
            <choice>
              <sic>brok</sic>
              <corr>broke</corr>
            </choice> the
            <choice>
              <sic>silnec</sic>
              <corr>silence</corr>
            </choice> of the forests was <del>like a</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>birds voice, singing out of doors. It was</del> the voice of</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><rs type="person" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#psn-anon">Anon</rs>. <del>He had no comfort indoors, little light</del></l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>and no books.</del> He had 
            <choice>
              <sic>n</sic>
              <corr>no</corr>
            </choice> name. Some one heard the song</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">and 
            <choice>
              <sic>rmember d</sic>
              <corr>remembered</corr>
            </choice> it, for it was later written down. <del hand="ms">The</del><add place="above">Thus</add>the singer</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">had his audience <del>thus</del>; but the audience was so little</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">interested in his name that he never thought to give it.</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">The audience took part <del>too</del> in the song. <quote source="#" rend="inline">"Terly, terlow"</quote></l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">they sang: and <quote source="#" rend="inline">"By, by lullay"</quote> filling in 
            <choice>
              <sic>th </sic>
              <corr>the</corr>
            </choice> pause<del>,</del></l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">helping out the <add place="above">larger</add>meaning.<add hand="ms" place="inline">[</add><rs type="person" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#psn-anon" key="Anon">Anon</rs> sings because spring has</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">come; or winter is gone; 
            <choice>
              <sic>b cause</sic>
              <corr>because</corr>
            </choice> he loves; because he</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">is hungry; or lustful; or merry.<add place="inline" hand="ms">]</add> Everybody shares the</l>
